benefits.subtitle: Track Store Capacities
benefits.text: CapTracks provides real-time in-store capacities and wait-times directly from vendors.

benefits.subtitle: View Updated Store Info
benefits.text: View up-to-date information, such as storesâ€™ daily promotions, COVID-19 guidelines, restocking days, and other vendor verified information.

benefits.subtitle: Seamless Communication
benefits.text: Use your store's forum to keep customers updated on essential information, such as daily promotions, restocking information, COVID-19 guidelines and more!
